info.title: Single Cell Portal REST API
info.description: REST API Documentation for the Single Cell Portal

tags.name: Site

200.description: list of available metadata convention schemas

get.summary: Load a metadata convention schema file
get.description: Returns a schema definition file for the requested metadata convention, in JSON or TSV format. Refer above for available schemas.

parameters.name: schema_format
parameters.description: File format of convention schema, either JSON or TSV

200.description: Metadata convention schema file in requested format

get.description: Returns a list of all registerd Taxons (species) available in the portal
Finds a single Taxon
Current API Status

503.description: Service unavailable, usually due to scheduled deployment

get.summary: Find all Studies viewable to user
get.description: Returns all Studies viewable by the current user, including public studies
View a single Study, and any StudyFiles available for download/streaming

Download a single StudyFile (via signed URL)

NOTE: Due to CORS issues, files cannot be downloaded via Swagger. To download a file, either use a client such as Postman, or copy/paste the CURL command into a terminal and add the '-L' flag immediately before the URL.

parameters.description: ID of FireCloud submission from which to remove bucket submission directory

204.description: Analysis submission bucket directory successfully deleted

get.summary: Faceted & keyword search for studies & cells
get.description: Search studies or cells using facets and keywords.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of query to perform (study- or cell-based)

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description: User-supplied list facets and filters, formatted as: "facet_id:filter_value+facet_id_2:filter_value_2,filter_value_3"

parameters.name: genes
parameters.description: space-delimited list of genes.  e.g. "agpat2 farsa"

parameters.name: scpbr
parameters.description: Requested branding group (to filter results on)

total_pages.title: Total number of pages of studies

total_studies.title: Total number of studies matching search

matching_accessions.description: Array of study accessions matching query

facets.title: SearchFacets
facets.description: Array of facets/filters used in search

get.description: Returns a list of all available search facets, including filter values

parameters.name: scpbr
parameters.description: Requested branding group (to filter facets on)

get.summary: Search matching filters for a facet
get.description: Returns a list of matching facet filters for a given facet

post.summary: Create one-time auth code for downloads
post.description: Create and return a one-time authorization code (OTAC) to identify a user for bulk downloads

200.description: One-time auth code and time interval, in seconds

time_interval.description: Time interval (in seconds) OTAC will be valid

get.summary: Preview of number of files/bytes requested for download
get.description: Preview of the number of files and bytes (by file type) requested for download from search results

200.description: Information about total number of files and sizes by type
200.title: FileSizesByType

total_bytes.description: Total number of bytes for Expression files
Total number of bytes for Metadata files
Total number of bytes for Cluster files
Total number of bytes for Coordinate Labels files
Total number of bytes for Fastq files
Total number of bytes for BAM files
Total number of bytes for Documentation files
Total number of bytes for Other files
Total number of bytes for Analysis Output files
Total number of bytes for Ideogram Annotations files

400.description: Invalid study accessions or requested file types

get.description: Download files in bulk of multiple types from one or more studies via curl

200.description: Curl configuration file with signed URLs for requested data

400.description: Invalid study accessions or requested file types

403.description: User unauthorized to download with provided auth_token, or download exceeds user quota

embargo.description: Date used for restricting download access to StudyFiles in Study

description.description: Plain text description blob for Study

firecloud_project.description: FireCloud billing project to which Study firecloud_workspace belongs

firecloud_workspace.description: FireCloud workspace that corresponds to this Study

use_existing_workspace.description: Boolean indication whether this Study used an existing FireCloud workspace when created

bucket_id.description: GCS Bucket name where uploaded files are stored

data_dir.description: Local directory where uploaded files are localized to (for parsing)

public.description: Boolean indication of whether Study is publicly readable

queued_for_deletion.description: Boolean indication whether Study is queued for garbage collection

branding_group_id.description: ID of BrandingGroup to which Study belongs, if present

initialized.description: Boolean indication of whether Study has at least one of all required StudyFile types parsed to enable visualizations (Expression Matrix, Metadata, Cluster)

detached.description: Boolean indication of whether Study has been 'detached' from its FireCloud workspace, usually when the workspace is deleted directly in FireCloud

view_count.description: Number of times Study has been viewed in the portal

cell_count.description: Number of unique cell names in Study (set from Metadata StudyFile)

gene_count.description: Number of unique gene names in Study (set from Expression Matrix or 10X Genes File)

view_order.description: Number used to control sort order in which Studies are returned when searching/browsing

embargo.description: Date used for restricting download access to StudyFiles in Study

study_url.description: Relative URL path to view study

inferred_match.description: Indication if match is inferred (e.g. converting facet filter value to keyword search)

preset_match.description: Indication this study was whitelisted by a preset search

gene_matches.description: Array of ids of the genes that were matched for this study

can_visualize_clusters.description: Whether this study has cluster visualization data available

study_files.title: StudyFiles
study_files.description: Available StudyFiles for download, by type

study_id.description: ID of Study to which StudyFile belongs

taxon_id.description: Database ID of Taxon entry (species) to which StudyFile belongs, if required/present.  THIS IS NOT THE NCBI TAXON ID.

species.description: (optional) Common name of a species registered in the portal to set taxon_id association manually

genome_assembly_id.description: ID of GenomeAssembly to which StudyFile belongs, if required/present

assembly.description: (optional) Common name of a genome assembly registered in the portal to set genome_assembly_id association manually

study_file_bundle_id.description: ID of StudyFileBundle to which StudyFile belongs, if present

name.description: Name of StudyFile (either filename or name of Cluster/Gene List)

description.description: StudyFile description, used in download views

upload.description: File object that StudyFile represents (will auto-set all upload_* attributes from File headers)

upload_file_size.description: Size (in bytes) of upload File object

upload_updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of upload File object

file_type.description: Type of file, governs parsing/caching behavior

status.description: Status of File object upload (new, uploading, or uploaded)

parse_status.description: Parse status of StudyFile (unparsed, parsing, or parsed)

data_dir.description: Local directory where File object is localized to (for parsing)

remote_location.description: Location in GCS bucket of File object

human_fastq_url.description: External URL for human sequence data (if required)

human_data.description: Boolean indication whether StudyFile represents human data

use_metadata_convention.description: Boolean indication whether StudyFile uses the metadata convention

generation.description: GCS generation tag of File in bucket

x_axis_label.description: Label to use on X axis of plots (for Clusters)

y_axis_label.description: Label to use on Y axis of plots (for Clusters, Expression Matrix, MM Coordinate Matrix)

z_axis_label.description: Label to use on Z axis of plots (for Clusters)

queued_for_deletion.description: Boolean indication whether file is queued for garbage collection

options.description: Key/Value storage of extra file options

taxon_id.description: Database ID of Taxon entry (species) to which StudyFile belongs, if required/present.  THIS IS NOT THE NCBI TAXON ID.

species.description: (optional) Common name of a species registered in the portal to set taxon_id association manually

assembly.description: (optional) Common name of a genome assembly registered in the portal to set genome_assembly_id association manually
